messages.subject: Re: At long last --- Saitou spying on Kenshin?
messages.msgSnippet: Good going Phil! Thanks Black Faery for me too... The first picture definitely reminds me of RK Saitou... The second well I guess he just looks more menacing
messages.messageBody:
Good going Phil! Thanks Black Faery for me too... The first picture
definitely reminds me of RK Saitou... The second well I guess he
just looks more menacing and psycho... I'm going to need to find
those discs and watch that episode again..

messages.subject: At long last --- Saitou spying on Kenshin?
messages.msgSnippet: Some time ago, MissB made note on the messageboard of a guy who looked like Saitou among Raijuta s henchmen (the episode in Izu where we meet Yutaro --- I ve
messages.messageBody:
Some time ago, MissB made note on the messageboard of a guy who
looked like Saitou among Raijuta's henchmen (the episode in Izu where
we meet Yutaro --- I've forgotten the specifics, but I think it's
episode 20?). Unfortunately, Black Faery never got my "HELP" email,
but she's come through for us after I resent the info to her last
night. She sent me two screenshots, which I've put in the Photos
section in a folder titled "Saitou in Disguise." I don't think MissB
or I are crazy --- that's got to be Saitou! (Keep in mind that in the
anime, when Saitou and Kenshin meet again after 10 years at Kaoru's
dojo, Saitou makes a comment about how Kenshin let a fool like
Raijuta wound him in battle... hinting at maybe he was there to see
the fight.) What do the rest of you think, hmmm?

I'm going to put the screenshots up on my shrine site (Let's Hear It
For the Boy!) and will post a link to them on shinsengumimb.com.
Give me a couple days, though, okay? :-D

phil (spying on the spies... what fun!)
